alert.note: Alert for Copiah; Hinds; Rankin; Simpson; Warren (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 9:56PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Warren, Rankin, Simpson, Hinds and Copiah Counties through 1100 PM CDT... At 956 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Flowood to near Vicksburg. Movement was south at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Pearl, Brandon and Flowood around 1000 PM CDT. Richland around 1005 PM CDT. Monterey around 1010 PM CDT. Vicksburg and Florence around 1015 PM CDT. Newman around 1020 PM CDT. Star around 1025 PM CDT. Piney Woods around 1030 PM CDT. Utica and Harrisville around 1040 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include D`Lo, Learned, Braxton, Puckett and Georgetown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
